EmailTemplate.subject: Could you manage your cash more effectively and save money?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’re excited to invite you to join NCR’s expert panel discussing challenges faced today with Cash Management, Thursday June 17th 2-2.30pm EST. The costs of cash holding and delivery are the highest expenses in ATM operation, but implementing a cash management solution to reduce this expense can sometimes feel too complex or risky. - Why is cash management important? - What is the difference between cash management and cash optimisation? - Is this still needed when new technologies like recycling can reduce cash handling? - It sounds complex and expensive to do this – is it worth it? Our expert panel, will address these questions and discuss the technology solutions that can help you improve your cash management and save money. - Fiona McDade, Moderator Senior Marketing Manager - Robert Johnston, Panelist, Senior Marketing Manager, Cash Management - Edgar Rojas, Panelist, Executive Director, Cash Management Join us for ‘extended coffee break’ on 17th June, 2-2.30pm EST.
